Access-Control-Expose-Headers (W3C TR http://www.w3.org/TR/cors)

The Access-Control-Expose-Headers header indicates which headers are safe to expose to the API of a CORS API specification.

_journey/design/headers/access-control-expose-headers-w3c-tr-http-www.w3.org-tr-cors.md
